Sentencas: Yttrium-doped strontium titanate is a perovskite with a great potential to act as an anode material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis, microstructural properties and chemical stability of 3DOM structures of Sr1-xYxTiO3

Sentencas: Two different synthesis procedures have been used to modify and optimize perovskite morphology.
Titulo: Synthesis, microstructural properties and chemical stability of 3DOM structures of Sr1-xYxTiO3

Sentencas: First way involved usage of surfactant TX-100 and led to obtainment of irregular structure with pore diameter of 150-200 nm, whereas in the second one, spheres of poly (methyl methacrylate) acted as soft templates and led to attainment of highly regular hollow perovskite network with pore diameter of around 110 nm.
Titulo: Synthesis, microstructural properties and chemical stability of 3DOM structures of Sr1-xYxTiO3

Sentencas: The discussion concerning the influence of yttrium on thermal properties of material, thermal expansion coefficients and chemical stability (in water-carbon dioxide rich atmosphere) were presented.
Titulo: Synthesis, microstructural properties and chemical stability of 3DOM structures of Sr1-xYxTiO3

Sentencas: It was found that introduction of yttrium into the strontium titanate leads to the decrease of SrTiO3 shrinkage temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis, microstructural properties and chemical stability of 3DOM structures of Sr1-xYxTiO3

Sentencas: Moreover, coupling TG measurements with mass spectrometry allowed to determinate behavior of pure and yttrium-doped strontium titanate in H2O and CO2 containing atmosphere.
Titulo: Synthesis, microstructural properties and chemical stability of 3DOM structures of Sr1-xYxTiO3

Sentencas: It was observed that addition of yttrium into SrTiO3 has no influence on materials stability.
Titulo: Synthesis, microstructural properties and chemical stability of 3DOM structures of Sr1-xYxTiO3
